page.title: 15NEW ROMNEY FARMS
page.content: MORE THAN HALF OF ROMNEY MARSH IS ARABLE.A REPORT ON TWO LOCAL FARMS. FARM 1 WE GROW POTATOES, WHEAT,STRAWBERRIES AND BULBS.SOME OF THE PASTURE IS SOLD AS TURF AS IT IS SO GOOD.THE LAND IS PLOUGHED,IT IS RE-SEEDED WITH RYE GRASS AND WHITE CLOVER THEN SHEEP ARE PUT BACK ON FOR A WHILE.WE HAVE ALSO GOT COWS BECAUSE FRESH WATER IS BEING BROUGHT IN BY THE DYKES. FARM 2 CATTLE ARE UNUSUAL BECAUSE THE MARSH IS FAMOUS FOR ITS SHEEP.AT RYE MARKET WE SELL RAMS TO OTHER COUNTRIES.ROOT CROPS GROW BEST,POTATOES BY THE TON,SOME LINSEED,BEANS,WHEAT AND OATS. THE MARSH IS FAMOUS FOR TURNIP SEED, RUNNER BEANS,SPINACH,RED CLOVER AND WHITE CLOVER,PEAS,BEANS AND CARROTS.
